A C D E F G H I M N O P Q R S T U V W X Y Z

T

theta - Static variable in class Universe
Theta defines what constitutes the distance at which particles are considered "sufficiently far away" for force acting on it to be summarized using the quadtree.
thetaDown - Variable in class Universe
Buttons which will control the Applet
thetaLabel - Variable in class Universe
Labels to convey information about the current state of physics
thetaUp - Variable in class Universe
Buttons which will control the Applet
Threader - Class in <Unnamed>
The Threader class defines the thread that runs the physics of the simulation
Threader() - Constructor for class Threader
The default constructor just creates a thread and makes the running class null
Threader(ThreadListener) - Constructor for class Threader
Sets the running class and creates the thread
Threader(String, ThreadListener) - Constructor for class Threader
Sets the running class, and creates the thread with a name
ThreadListener - Interface in <Unnamed>
ThreadListener defines a class that can have a threader run it
timeStep() - Method in interface ThreadListener
If the Applet is not paused and the particle system has been initialized, the method tells the system to simulate physics at each time step, and then displays the results in the Applet window.
timeStep() - Method in class Universe
The method called by the physics thread.
timesteps - Static variable in class Universe
The number of times a full iteration of the physics calculations has been completed since the last time the user hit the run button
totalMass - Variable in class Octant
The location and magnitude of the center of mass of the quadrant
totalMass - Variable in class Quadrant
The location and magnitude of the center of mass of the quadrant
TreeNode - Class in <Unnamed>
TreeNode class defines a Node in a quadtree
TreeNode() - Constructor for class TreeNode
The default constructor doesn't do much
TreeNode(Quadrant) - Constructor for class TreeNode
The constructor sets the quadrant to the one passed in, and sets all the sub-quadrants to null
TreeNode3D - Class in <Unnamed>
TreeNode3D class defines a Node in an octree
TreeNode3D() - Constructor for class TreeNode3D
The default constructor doesn't do much
TreeNode3D(Octant) - Constructor for class TreeNode3D
The constructor sets the octant to the one passed in, and sets all the sub-octants to null
